scripts.start: npx sequleize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all && node server.js

name: fitness-tracker-backend
description: The Workout Zone is built for anyone and everyone to have access to proper exercise instruction without the cost of a gym membership or a coach.  It was built using React, Node, Express, Sequelize, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and a little blood and sweat!
